title: Server Issues; Unfair Game
body:
Literally disconnected the entire game at a constant 130-300 ping. Me and a jungler in the game both kept randomly d/cing while the WHOLE enemy team stayed in the game and obviously got the upper hand. I find it really unfair and a stupid loss that I lost  LP for something that wasn't even remotely my fault on my side.

I understand that you're working on it but it really isn't right if people actually lost LP because of server problems that we can't control and the other team walks away with a free win and 20LP.

replies.body:
There was a recorded service outage a few hours before you posted this that were resolved by the time you posted this discussion. While I cannot restore your LP after the server records a loss, I can help you troubleshoot any other connection issues if you're still having problems. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Unfortunately, due to the nature of these issues, Riot isn't able to predict when it'll happen and there's short timeframe before they confirm it's an issue.
